remarks: Distributive law for the multiplication operation of a ring (left-distributivity).  (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.)
statement:
ringdi.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
ringdi.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) $.
ringdi.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) $.
ringdi $p |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( X .x. ( Y .+ Z ) ) = ( ( X .x. Y ) .+ ( X .x. Z ) ) ) $.
